code:
import{useState,useEffect,useCallback,useContext}from'react';import{AuthContext}from'../context/AuthContext';import{offReceiveMessage,disconnectSocket}from'../services/socketService';import{getChatHistory}from'../services/apiService';import{generateChatResponse}from'../services/openaiService';import{useOpenAI}from'./useOpenAI';// Demo messages for initial chat history
const DEMO_MESSAGES=[{_id:'1',content:'Hello! How can I help you today?',isUser:false,timestamp:new Date(Date.now()-3600000)// 1 hour ago
}];// Bot responses for demo mode (used as fallback if OpenAI fails)
const BOT_RESPONSES=["I'm here to help! What can I do for you?","That's an interesting question. Let me think about that...","I understand what you're asking. Here's what I know about that topic.","Thanks for sharing that information with me.","Let me search for that information for you...","I found several resources that might help with your question.","Could you provide more details about your request?","I'm designed to assist with a variety of topics. What else would you like to know?","That's a great point! I appreciate your insight.","I'm continuously learning to better assist users like you."];// More specific responses based on keywords (used as fallback if OpenAI fails)
const KEYWORD_RESPONSES={"hello":["Hello there! How can I assist you today?","Hi! What can I help you with?","Greetings! How may I be of service?"],"help":["I'd be happy to help! What do you need assistance with?","I'm here to help! Could you let me know what you're looking for?","I can help with various tasks. What specifically do you need help with?"],"weather":["The weather today is looking great! Clear skies and 75°F.","Today's forecast shows partly cloudy conditions with a high of 72°F.","It looks like there might be some rain later today. Current temperature is 68°F."],"time":[`The current time is ${new Date().toLocaleTimeString()}.`,`It's currently ${new Date().toLocaleTimeString()} in your local time zone.`,`According to my clock, it's ${new Date().toLocaleTimeString()}.`],"thanks":["You're welcome! Is there anything else I can help with?","My pleasure! Let me know if you need anything else.","Happy to help! Any other questions?"],"bye":["Goodbye! Have a great day!","Farewell! Feel free to return if you have more questions.","Until next time! Take care!"]};export const useChat=()=>{const{token,user}=useContext(AuthContext);const{apiKey,isValidKey}=useOpenAI();const[messages,setMessages]=useState([]);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);const[isTyping,setIsTyping]=useState(false);const[error,setError]=useState(null);// Initialize chat and load history
useEffect(()=>{if(!token)return;const initializeChat=async()=>{try{setLoading(true);// In a real app, we would connect to the socket server
// connectSocket(token);
// Try to load history from API, fall back to demo data if unavailable
try{const history=await getChatHistory(token);setMessages(history);}catch(err){// Use demo messages as fallback
setMessages(DEMO_MESSAGES);}setError(null);}catch(err){console.error('Error initializing chat:',err);// Still set demo messages even if there's an error
setMessages(DEMO_MESSAGES);setError(null);// Clear error since we have fallback
}finally{setLoading(false);}};initializeChat();// Clean up on unmount
return()=>{offReceiveMessage();disconnectSocket();};},[token]);// Generate a response using OpenAI or fallback to demo responses
const generateResponse=async(userMessage,chatHistory)=>{// If we have a valid OpenAI API key, use it
if(apiKey&&isValidKey){try{const historyForAPI=chatHistory.slice(-10);// Only use last 10 messages to save tokens
return await generateChatResponse(historyForAPI,apiKey);}catch(error){console.error('OpenAI API error:',error);// Fall back to demo responses if OpenAI fails
}}// Fallback to demo mode
// Check for keyword-based responses
const lowercaseContent=userMessage.toLowerCase();const matchingKeyword=Object.keys(KEYWORD_RESPONSES).find(keyword=>lowercaseContent.includes(keyword));if(matchingKeyword){// Get a random response for the matching keyword
const responses=KEYWORD_RESPONSES[matchingKeyword];return responses[Math.floor(Math.random()*responses.length)];}else{// If no keyword matches, use generic responses
return BOT_RESPONSES[Math.floor(Math.random()*BOT_RESPONSES.length)];}};// Send message function with bot response 
const sendChatMessage=useCallback(async content=>{if(!content.trim())return;// Create a user message
const userMessage={_id:Date.now().toString(),content,isUser:true,timestamp:new Date()};// Add to messages state
setMessages(prevMessages=>[...prevMessages,userMessage]);// Start typing indicator
setIsTyping(true);setError(null);try{// Generate response
const chatHistory=[...messages,userMessage];const responseContent=await generateResponse(content,chatHistory);// Create bot message with response
const botMessage={_id:(Date.now()+1).toString(),content:responseContent,isUser:false,timestamp:new Date()};// Add bot message to state
setMessages(prevMessages=>[...prevMessages,botMessage]);}catch(err){console.error('Error generating response:',err);setError(err.message||'Failed to generate a response. Please try again.');}finally{setIsTyping(false);}},[messages,apiKey,isValidKey]);// Add a welcome message if chat is empty
useEffect(()=>{if(!loading&&messages.length===0){setMessages([{_id:'welcome',content:`Hello${user?' '+user.username:''}! How can I assist you today?`,isUser:false,timestamp:new Date()}]);}},[loading,messages.length,user]);return{messages,loading,isTyping,error,sendMessage:sendChatMessage};};
